card_text: 1 Spellcaster-Type Synchro Monster + 1 Spellcaster-Type monster$NThis monster can only be Special Summoned by Fusion Summon (from the Extra Deck). When this card is Fusion Summoned, place 2 Spell Counters on it. This card gains 1000 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. Once per turn, you can remove 1 Spell Counter from your side of the field to activate 1 of the following effects:$N●Select 1 card on the field, and destroy it.$N●Draw 1 card.
